duties_responsibilities.duty: Master store products, services, loyalty programs, and Macy’s sales systems and use knowledge to help customers find what they need and suggest additional items.

Develop customer relationships to grow business and expand our client base. Respond to customer requests for additional merchandise or other assistance, including sharing how to use an electronic device to shop and compare. Assist in locating and pulling merchandise to fulfill digital customer orders.
Maintain department recovery standards, including selling floor and fitting rooms.
Deliver optimal merchandise execution presentation, ensure accurate merchandise pricing, and process markdowns in a timely and accurate manner.
